AggregateController - Class in controller
Objective: create a class that aggregates a list of gesture controllers that represent the same gesture, use k-nearest neighbor to see how well a new gesture fits in this aggregate gesture.

angle(float, float, float, float) - Static method in class controller.GestureController
Calculates the angle between the two given points given by forming a triangle with the vertices alpha,beta,gamma where gammaX = alphaX and gammaY = betaY.
